channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. consumer-sentiment improvement is first in six months
Trump administration tells 500,000 immigrants to 'self-deport' after revoking protections
item.description: President Donald Trump eliminated a temporary protected status program even as he bemoaned a shortage of undocumented immigrants in farm and hotel ind...

item.title: Dow falls 500 points at opening bell after Israel strikes Iran — live updates
Cboe volatility gauge ‘VIX’ surges more than 10% after Israel hits Iran
Trump loses bid for appeals court bid to rehear E. Jean Carroll case
item.description: Trump was ordered to pay E. Jean Carroll $5 million in the case by a New York federal jury which found he had sexually abused and defamed the writer.

item.title: Israel-Iran strikes likely just the opening salvo as region and markets brace for what comes next
item.description: Israel's overnight missile barrage was the largest attack on the Islamic Republic since the Iran-Iraq war of the 1980s.

item.title: Economic calendar: Consumer-sentiment reading is Friday data highlight
Trump keeps control of California National Guard for now after appeals court blocks order
item.description: California Gov. Newsom said the ruling by Judge Charles Breyer was a "check" on President Trump, "whose authoritarian tendencies are increasing by the...

item.title: Trump urges Iran to reach nuclear deal 'before there is nothing left'
item.description: "Iran must make a deal, before there is nothing left, and save what was once known as the Iranian Empire," the Washington leader said.

item.title: All is relatively quiet on the bond-market front. Here’s why.
